projects.title: Visualizing Melody, Harmony, & Improvisation
projects.description: How can people unfamiliar with harmony and theory better understand jazz improvizations or music in general? I attempt to explore new ways of understanding and analyzing music through custom interactive visualizations. Visualizations were made in d3.js and the data is primarily MIDI format.

timeline.description: Started as a Data Engineering Intern at Samsung Research Canada
Started as a Data Scientist Intern at WorkSafeBc's Innovation Team.
Started as a Software & NLP Engineer Intern at BetterCart.
Awarded 2nd place for the Technical Solutions category at the SFU Business Analytics Hackathon.
Started as a Data Scientist Intern at the CBSA (Canadian Border Service Agency).
Participated in the BC Student AI Showcase where I presented a multi-target classification model for categorizing toxic comments.

Started as a Parliamentary Intern for the Government of Canada where I worked closely with an MP to develop briefings, questions, assisted with public affairs, and contributed to International Relations research.
Instructed a class on Java and OOP concepts for ~60 students in association with Illuminate.
Started Jazz Performance undergraduate studies at the University of Toronto.
